content: leomercier: Fixed a tsup build error in the client-twitter component through PR #402 (+16/-8 lines) and created issue #401 "DTS Build error" which was subsequently closed. Made substantial code changes across 82 files (+62,241/-35,750 lines) with a primary focus on bugfixes (55%), while also having an open PR #200 for a new cashtags feature. Activity was sporadic, concentrated on just 2 days this month, with contributions spanning both code (55%) and configuration files (27%).
